Title: Requires health care practitioners to provide up to date and evidence based information on Down syndrome to parents of infants who have Down syndrome
Summary: Requires health care practitioners to provide a written or an alternative format of up to date and evidence based information on Down syndrome to pregnant women and parents of infants who test positive for Down syndrome.
LawCode: Add ยง13.44, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to Down syndrome diagnosis awareness
